alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; San Joaquin River Canyon; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 20 at 3:05AM PDT until March 22 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Up to 6 inches of additional snow. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...The Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM PDT Monday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Monday night through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds can could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
